subject: CBSNews.com News Video Alert! President Bush News Conference, 11 A.M.
body:
The president will speak about immigration reform and the Iraq war funding 
bill from the White House Rose Garden.

Watch the news conference live at 11 a.m. ET on CBSNews.com.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
